blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: hp-slaps
blog.title: I Chose The Grumpy Font Cuz Me Af

summary: Do you think, when Voldemort arrived in their home, James and Lily knew that Peter was a Deatheater all along. Cause I think...
body:
Do you think, when Voldemort arrived in their home, James and Lily knew that Peter was a Deatheater all along. Cause I think they might have been under the impression that he was tortured into spilling their hiding place. Perhaps they might have felt some form of pity for him.

Honestly, this has been keeping me up, cause I can’t stop thinking about James’ first thought being,” Shit, I hope Wormtail’s alive”. I find it hard to believe that James would feel any disdain towards his friend. Like obviously he would’ve felt really disappointed and angry, because his son’s life was on the line.

But actually hating Peter? There’s just no way.

I’m gonna go curl up and sob myslef to sleep.

summary:
Hufflepuff: I’m going to tell Gryff you said that.
Ravenclaw: Don't. Gryff will kill me. Do you want to be dead?
Hufflepuff:...
body:
Hufflepuff: I’m going to tell Gryff you said that.

Ravenclaw: Don’t. Gryff will kill me. Do you want to be dead?

Hufflepuff: *raises eyebrows*

Ravenclaw: Okay. So I gave you an easy opening.

blog.description: Hi, I'm someoneoutofthisworld, a slytherin and most importantly i ship drarry, klance and a shit ton of other ships.

body:
Eating something hot


Slytherin: will eat it hot while dying inside

Hufflepuff: will wait for it to cool down

Gryffindor: will eat it hot while screaming

Ravenclaw: will create an incredibly complex device to cool down their food ( think of that tumblr post with straws and soup )

blog.name: tons-of-fanfiction
blog.title: x Readers
blog.description:
Request to make your life (and mine!) better!
MASTERLIST

title: Butterbeard: Draco Malfoy x Reader
body:
Summary: Draco confesses his love for [Y/n] over some butterbeer.

Paring: Draco Malfoy x Reader

Genre:  Fluff. Imagine.

Requested: No

Word Count: 572

Warnings: None

A/N: This was written, like, four years ago. It’s kinda cringy, but cute. My other stories should be better. Enjoy!

Masterlist

Reader’s POV

I walked into The Three Broomsticks. I looked around to find any of my friends. There was Blaise, my best friend, but he was snogging Pansy. I don’t think I wanna drink butterbeer with the two lovebirds. As I was further into the inn, I notice Draco a few seats away. I’m not surprised he moved away from Pansy and Blaise. I sat down across from him and took off my scarf. 

“Hullo.” I mumbled. Draco turned to look at me and grunted in response.

Just then, Madame Rosmerta walked by. I took my chance and quickly ordered two butterbeers. 

I turned to face Draco and smiled, “Are you alright?”

“No! Blaise goes around kissing everybody! And it doesn’t even matter to him that I’m here alone now!”

“You’re not alone anymore, Draco. I’m here. Isn’t that good?” I hoped he’d say it is, because I have had a large crush on him since second year. Three years have passed and he is still always on my mind.

Draco’s POV

“Of course it’s good. You’re my best friend, [Y/n],” I said, “and that means it’s always good when you’re around.”

[Y/n] smiled. I can’t let her know I’m in love with her… yet.

Just then, Madame Rosmerta placed two large mugs of butterbeer on our table. I looked over at Blaise. He was now under Pansy, who wrapped her legs around his waist and is now sitting on top of him. Just as Madame Rosmerta asked if we would like something else, I said, “Yes, could you please ask those two to stop making out so vigorously? It’s grossing out the other customers.”

She nodded and went over to the other table. I looked at [Y/n] and grinned. This was already fun.

Reader’s POV

I was really enjoying myself. Then, Draco took a sip of his butterbeer. He gulped half of the jug down in one go, and as he was lowering his glass, I noticed an off-white stripe above his upper lip. I laughed. “Draco! You- You have a- Moustache! A butterbeer moustache! A… Butterbeard!” I said in between laughs. His eyes widened in realisation as he finally understood what I had said. Draco grabbed a napkin from the table and grinned. Laughing, he wiped off his butterbeard.
“Genius,” was all he said.

Draco’s POV
This was a happy moment and I decided that I should confess my love to [Y/n] now. “Hey… [Y/n]?”
“Yeah?” She turned to look at me.
“I… Have something to tell you.”
“I’m listening.” She grinned. Man, this is hard.
“Okay, well… Uhmm… I wanna thank you, for always being there for me since year one. I just wanna say… I… think I… love you.” Seeing the surprised expression on her face, I immediately assumed the worst. “I… love you as a… friend, of course.”
“Oh.”
“Yeah.”
“Just as a friend, Draco?”
“As… a really close friend.” She seemed sad now. So maybe she does love me… More than a friend? I’ll try.
“Okay, fine. I love you more than as a friend. I have had a crush on you since first year, and I just never knew how to tell you. Please don’t let this ruin our friendship,” I begged.
“No, I won’t. I love you too, Draco,” she blushed slightly.
“Will you be my girlfriend?”
She thought carefully about it.
“Only if you do the butterbeard again!”

Masterlist

I sat down across from him and took off my scarf. 

“Hullo.” I mumbled. Draco turned to look at me and grunted in response.

Just then, Madame Rosmerta walked by. I took my chance and quickly ordered two butterbeers. 

I turned to face Draco and smiled, “Are you alright?”

“No! Blaise goes around kissing everybody! And it doesn’t even matter to him that I’m here alone now!”

“You’re not alone anymore, Draco. I’m here. Isn’t that good?” I hoped he’d say it is, because I have had a large crush on him since second year. Three years have passed and he is still always on my mind.

Draco’s POV

“Of course it’s good. You’re my best friend, [Y/n],” I said, “and that means it’s always good when you’re around.”

[Y/n] smiled. I can’t let her know I’m in love with her… yet.

Just then, Madame Rosmerta placed two large mugs of butterbeer on our table. I looked over at Blaise. He was now under Pansy, who wrapped her legs around his waist and is now sitting on top of him. Just as Madame Rosmerta asked if we would like something else, I said, “Yes, could you please ask those two to stop making out so vigorously? It’s grossing out the other customers.”

She nodded and went over to the other table. I looked at [Y/n] and grinned. This was already fun.

Reader’s POV

I was really enjoying myself. Then, Draco took a sip of his butterbeer. He gulped half of the jug down in one go, and as he was lowering his glass, I noticed an off-white stripe above his upper lip. I laughed. “Draco! You- You have a- Moustache! A butterbeer moustache! A… Butterbeard!” I said in between laughs. His eyes widened in realisation as he finally understood what I had said. Draco grabbed a napkin from the table and grinned. Laughing, he wiped off his butterbeard.
“Genius,” was all he said.

Draco’s POV
This was a happy moment and I decided that I should confess my love to [Y/n] now. “Hey… [Y/n]?”
“Yeah?” She turned to look at me.
“I… Have something to tell you.”
“I’m listening.” She grinned. Man, this is hard.
“Okay, well… Uhmm… I wanna thank you, for always being there for me since year one. I just wanna say… I… think I… love you.” Seeing the surprised expression on her face, I immediately assumed the worst. “I… love you as a… friend, of course.”
“Oh.”
“Yeah.”
“Just as a friend, Draco?”
“As… a really close friend.” She seemed sad now. So maybe she does love me… More than a friend? I’ll try.
“Okay, fine. I love you more than as a friend. I have had a crush on you since first year, and I just never knew how to tell you. Please don’t let this ruin our friendship,” I begged.
“No, I won’t. I love you too, Draco,” she blushed slightly.
“Will you be my girlfriend?”
She thought carefully about it.
“Only if you do the butterbeard again!”

Masterlist
trail.content_abstract:
Summary: Draco confesses his love for [Y/n] over some butterbeer.

Paring: Draco Malfoy x Reader

Genre:  Fluff. Imagine.

Requested: No

Word Count: 572

Warnings: None

A/N: This was written, like, four years ago. It’s kinda cringy, but cute. My other stories should be better. Enjoy!

Am I a Gryffindor or am I a Hufflepuff? the world may never know ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ but I do know that I'm a child of God, so there's that X) pronouns: Mrs. Efron. Harry❤Hermione to infinity and beyond

summary:
“out of the ash, i rise with my red hair and eat men like air.”
 we are an upcoming riddle era au, set in 1948. the cultural...
caption:
“out of the ash, i rise with my red hair and eat men like air.”

we are an upcoming riddle era au, set in 1948. the cultural aftershocks of the sacred 28 publication are still being felt, even with overlapping wars threatening both muggle and wizarding britain. gellert grindelwald tears across europe while the charming tom riddle cultivates his own following- with enemies on every front, albus dumbledore’s hand is forced to action.

 keep an eye on us by following and tracking #jackalau!

home / staff / reserves / ask
